name: Maive: Prologue
description:
Play as Maive, a travelling storyteller with a magic book in this single-player interactive narrative about bringing her stories to life. 

Join Maive as she returns home after years away, and meet a unique cast of characters whose trials and experiences mirror her own. Lose yourself in the world of Maive’s magic book by playing as the characters on her pages, and discover why she left, how she became a storyteller, and the courage it takes for her to finally come home.

Maive - Prologue was created for our final year university project. Our small team of 3 worked hard on the game for as many months as we had. But we couldn't seem to leave Maive behind once we'd graduated. She, and her story, deserved more time than we were able to give as students. So we wrapped up what we are now calling the "prologue" - a proof of concept for an idea that we have since dismantled and are building from the ground up.
